text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Thank you for all the masks given to all the hospitals, but talking to some people at home, they can’t get the proper masks to avoid getting this Coronavirus.  They have to wait until May.  Please deliver to all the people who are stuck at home and can’t get them.   Thanks
